title: [High Plains, Cliff's Edge]
description: Rough, misshapen bushes cling to the lip of the ravine, some leaning over the precipice as the gradual erosion of the plain leads them on to their eventual doom in the rocky crevice below.  The desolate expanse of the moors extends to the north, the rolling landscape concealed here and there by shifting clouds of silvery mist.

Rough, misshapen bushes cling to the lip of the ravine, some leaning over the precipice as the gradual erosion of the plain leads them on to their eventual doom in the rocky crevice below.  The desolate expanse of the moors extends to the north, the rolling landscape concealed here and there by shifting clouds of moonlit mist.
